author: Special Correspondent
text:
The People’s Welfare Front (PWF) on Thursday demanded that the poor affected by the recent floods in Chennai should be relocated within the city and should not be provided houses outside.

Speaking at a protest of the alliance in Valluvar Kottam here, MDMK general secretary Vaiko said the poor, who lived on the embankments of the rivers and whose houses were washed away in the floods, were being moved out of the city in the garb of providing new houses.

Further, Mr. Vaiko said that while the Centre was willing to provide Rs. 1.25 lakh crore to Bihar for development, it has given less than Rs. 2,000 crore to Tamil Nadu as flood relief.
title: Relocate poor within city: PWF
